    • Method Detail

      • getEnumFromString

        public static <E extends java.lang.Enum<E>> java.lang.Enum<E> getEnumFromString(java.lang.Class<E> enumClass,
                                                                java.lang.String enumValue,
                                                                boolean compareByValue)
                                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method return Enum which name values is equals to String, which is given as parameter. If arguments are null or string value is empty or no match is found, then IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        enumClass - Enum class in which will be found enumValue.
        enumValue - value of field which will be compare in field in enumClass.
        compareByValue - flag which determine if comparison is done against string value or enum value.
        • True comparison is done against string value of enum.
        • False comparison is done against enum real value
        Returns:
        Enum, which has name equals enumValue in enumClass.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no match is found or arguments are null or empty.

      • getEnumDataInClass

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEnumDataInClass(java.lang.String fullClassName,
                                                                      java.lang.String fieldName)

      • getDataInEnumClass

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getDataInEnumClass(java.lang.String enumClassName)

      • getDataFromEnum

        private static <E extends java.lang.Enum<E>> java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getDataFromEnum(java.lang.Class<E> enumClass)
        This method return all enums in class.
        Parameters:
        enumClass - from which will be extracted enums.
        Returns:
        HashMap of value in enum. Key is enum name and concrete value is Enum.toString() result.
